entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Change signature" drops namespace qualifier for alias-qualified names #63628
  • Autocompletion for `extern alias` directives suggests field/property/method names #63626
  • CSharpNewDocumentFormatting SDK tests are flaky due to restore issues #63620
  • Symbol renaming takes forever due to the wrong MEF import of IToolTipPresenterFactory #63619
    17.4
  • BadImageFormatException for abstract static from non-generic interface #63617
  • Exception in `CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider` when callsites provide not enough arguments #63615
    17.4
  • `new str$$` completion shows two lowercase `string`, one as keyword and one as class name #63614
    17.4
  • Memory Leak when user InteractiveAssemblyLoader.RegisterDependency() #63613
    Backlog

Closed

  • "Error CS8034: failed to load Analyzer", if analyzer is packed with native dependencies #63396
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32826.146 #63627
  • Hot reload erases captured local variables in async function #63294
    17.4
  • Edit.SubwordExpandSelection should not include quotes #63539
    Backlog
  • Opening the interactive window hits debug assertion in CSharpSemanticModel.GetImportScopesCore #61426
    17.3
  • ServiceHub.Host.Node.x86.exe has been using 40% of my system resources all morning even though I'm not using VS2022 (dump provided) #63611
  • C# Deconstruct method as a default interface member on a generic interface is not detected from concrete types #63612
  • Analyzer throws warning RS1022 while creating a new AdhocWorkspace() #63589

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix casing in VB file #63630
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Delete Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.Desktop #63624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unskip error list tests #63623
  • Re-enable argument provider integration tests #63622
    Area-IDE
  • Add a try/catch to help us track down a crash #63621
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Convert workspaces and new document formatting integration tests to new framework #63610
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Don't include expanded items if there are exclusive items in the list #63625
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute in VB #63194
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify RecoverableText #63606
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63609
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - fix tabstop location for cursor in blocks #63519
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixes EnC slot mapping for certain kinds of synthesized variables lifted to state machine fields #63295
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update versions of external packages we reference #63544
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update NuGet version to fix MSBuildWorkspace tests #63603
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #63618
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63608
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Fix possible race condition in AnalyzerConfigWithInferredIndentationOptions #62545
    Area-IDE
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches #63585
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add stages to the Roslyn CI #63607
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Update 17 3 packages #63599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Use 'checked' names for synthesized vb intrinsic operators #63604
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not show "Convert to raw string" refactoring for C# version lower than 11 #63593
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets - Command Handler tests #63581
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade System.Memory to fully fix another MSBuild loading issue #63545
    Area-IDE
